r.d: Structures_Graph is a package for creating and manipulating graph datastructures. It allows building of directed and undirected graphs, with data and metadata stored in nodes. The library provides functions for graph traversing as well as for characteristic extraction from the graph topology.
r.n: - Bug #9682 only variables can be returned by reference - fix Bug #9661 notice in Structures_Graph_Manipulator_Topological::sort()
